SEARCH
Package com.github.epadronu.dwalin.core

Interface AbstractionLayer

All Known Subinterfaces:
Browser, NavigablePage, Page
All Known Implementing Classes:
Component
public sealed interface AbstractionLayer permits Browser, Component<P>, Page

Serves as the foundation layer for the Browser, Component, and Page types and encapsulates the common API shared among them.

Types implementing this interface will inherit the common behavior defined here, providing a consistent structure and interaction model across different components of the library.

See Also:

  • Component
  • Page

  • Method Details

    • open

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull default <P extends NavigablePage> P open(Class<P> pageObjectClass)

      Navigate to the desired page.

      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of the page to navigate to
      Parameters:
      pageObjectClass - a Class<P> providing the type of the page to navigate to
      Returns:
      a new instance of the page

    • open

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull default <P extends NavigablePage> P open(P... reified)

      Navigate to the desired page.

      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of the page to navigate to
      Parameters:
      reified - a P[] providing the type of the page to navigate to through a reified generic. Don't pass any values here.
      Returns:
      a new instance of the page
